document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Katie </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">walks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">simple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">pair </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Accompany </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">side, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Katie </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">runs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">unwearied </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">travel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">road, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Katie </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Kneels, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">loving </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">bands </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Still </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">clasp </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">pious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Knee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Katie, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">smile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">fortune </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">two </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Knit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">-" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: When Katie walks, this simple pair accompany  her side
